bibl.title: The Newest Sappho: Text, Apparatus Criticus, and Translation.
The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2

bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - The Papyri. - The poems (in the original order of Sappho Book 1): ""Fragment 15""; - ""Fragment 16""; - ""Fragment 16a""; - ""Fragment 17""; - ""Fragment 18""; - ""Fragment 18a""; - ""Fragment 5""; - ""Fragment 9""; - ""Brothers Song""; - ""Kypris Song""; - ""New fragment ""(unplaced). - Translations.
bibl.seg: Dirk Obbink, The Newest Sappho: Text, Apparatus Criticus, and Translation.

Anton Bierl & André Lardinois (edd.), The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2 = Mnemosyne. Supplements. 392 (Leiden - Boston, 2016) pp. 13-33.
